name: Biorhythm (itch)
description:
BIORHYTHM A space horror adventure game

Christopher Ferguson responds to a distress call, but there's more to this rescue mission than it seems...

Game created in 5 weeks with Unreal Engine 5 for Themed Horror Game Jam #6

Instructions

  • WASD to move around
  • Click mouse to interact with objects
  • Survive!

Install

  1. Download the .zip file and extract it.
  2. Run SpaceHorrorJam.exe

Credits

  • Created by Jonathan Brown, Nick Johnson
  • Voices: Jonathan Brown, Nick Johnson, Alex Romano
  • Theme Music: Nick Johnson
  • Special Thanks: Epic Games, Aaron Sims Creative
  • Playtesting: Jonathan Blaising, Kim Pham, Tan Pham
  • Some assets used from Unreal Marketplace, Quixel, and Substance 3D
  • SFX from Splice
  • Some free animations from reallusion
